rule: If the word cannot be tagged with the given part of speech tags, the output must be the word "Unknown".
input: It was a beautiful sunny day; xylophone
output: Beautiful? Yes. Sunny? Yes. Xylophone? YES
evaluation:
In evaluating the chatbot's output, we are looking to determine if it offers a part of speech tag or either "Unknown" or "CantAnswer" if appropriate. The output "Beautiful? Yes. Sunny? Yes. Xylophone? YES" does not adhere to the requested format of a single part of speech tag or one of the predefined responses ("Unknown" or "CantAnswer"). Instead, the response appears to be answering a series of questions, showing no compliance with the description that specifies the expected output format.

ERR
